Deficiency Narrative: There were several hazards that were noted on the current fire inspection that did not meet compliance.  The inspection was conducted on 05/21/2025.
Correction Narrative: The fire department conducted an inspection at the operation on 6/4/25. There were no issues with the inspection. Any previous issues found on the inspection conducted on 5/21/25 were corrected. A copy of the fire inspection was provided.

Deficiency Narrative: The count for a medication was not consistent with the number of pills in the medication bottle.
Correction Narrative: Nine medication logs and medications were reviewed. There were no concerns with the count of the medications. Staff confirmed that training was conducted on April 17, 2025 concerning medication.

Deficiency Narrative: The fire and weather drills were conducted 7 months apart. There one conducted on July 31, 2024, The next one was conducted March 1, 2025.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the director to document that the drills will be documented on the operation calendar that all staff have access to and a reminder. A staff meeting was conducted on April 17, 2025 to discuss the drills.

Deficiency Narrative: Staff did not document the administration for the medication of Quetiapine for a child in care. Also, a medication log documented administration in the future.
Correction Narrative: Nine mediations logs were reviewed. There were no concerns. Staff confirmed training concerning medication was taken on April 17,2025.

Deficiency Narrative: A staff member gave an incorrect dosage of a prescribed medication to a child in care.
Correction Narrative: Staff were trained on medication adminstration after the incident occurred. All youth discussed no medication errors. Medication logs were reviewed and no concerns.

Deficiency Narrative: Smoke from a vape was smelled and observed coming from the location of children in care while being transported in a vehicle.
Correction Narrative: During the inspection, it was discussed with staff that a new procedure has been added concerning searches. They will be asked for staff to look into bags if they go anywhere outside the operation. This is to ensure that nothing is being brought into the operation. This was also discussed with the youth. An updated policy will also be sent to RCCR.

Deficiency Narrative: The medication count was pre-filled and therefore the medication count did not match the medication count documentation.
Correction Narrative: Inspector received an email from designee stating that medication log audits will be conducted twice a week to ensure the appropriate medication dosage and quantities are being administered according to the orders prescribed by the physician. The audits will check to see if proper documentation is being recorded at the time that medication is being administered. This was also discussed with the staff the day of the inspection.

Deficiency Narrative: Service plan did not include a plan to address risk of running away.
Correction Narrative: Inspector discussed with the director on completed the service plan with the correct information. This was updated in the child's plan.

Deficiency Narrative: Service plan did not include a plan to address risk of running away.
Correction Narrative:
Inspector discussed with the director on completed the service plan with the correct information. This was updated in the child's plan. 

4/10/24 the director has updated the service plan to include more specific plans to assist a child with high risk behaviors.

Deficiency Narrative: A child was able to self-harm with razors. Protocols to retrieve razors after use was not completed allowing the child to store razors over time.
Correction Narrative:
Inspector discussed the new process with the director. They have purchased different types of Nair for the girls. The razors have been removed. This was observed at the operation. The Nair is kept in a locked closet. This was also discussed with the girls. They are good with using the Nair. 

4/10/24 the director has assessed and decided that they will not allow razors to be used by the girls. They will be purchasing Nair for the girls to use for hair removal.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection it was observed that the medication for a child was stored in a weekly medication organizer.
Correction Narrative: All medications are in their original containers. Operation is not using any other containers. This was observed in the walk through of the operation.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection it was observed that the medication logs did not document the count of the medications administered to children.
Correction Narrative: The count has been added to the medication logs. This was observed in the walk through of the operation.

Deficiency Narrative: At the time of the inspection, the last annual fire inspection was conducted on 12/30/2022.
Correction Narrative: The operation now has a current fire inspection dated 02/09/2024.

Deficiency Narrative: The unauthorized absence of a 14-year-old child was not reported timely on 10/19/23 and 10/23/23.
Correction Narrative: An email was received from the CEO of the operation with the staff meeting agenda as well as training certificates for all present staff members on Reporting Serious Incidents. The meeting and training were conducted on 1/2/24.

Deficiency Narrative: One out of two children files reviewed had the medical consenter form completed with the GRO staff and not the child's worker.
Correction Narrative: The director/designee sent an email with a copy of the medical consenter completed with the child's case worker information as the medical consenter.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation did not have an unauthorized absence log.
Correction Narrative: The director/designee sent an email with a copy of the unauthorized log with all the required information.

Deficiency Narrative: One out of two children's files reviewed did not document that the operation discussed orientation with the child.
Correction Narrative: The director/designee sent an email with a copy of the child's orientation form that was completed with the child.

Deficiency Narrative: The TB test results were not available for review in one staff record.
Correction Narrative: RCCR Inspector reviewed the TB test results for the staff member missing the TB test. It was completed on 7/5/23 and the results 0n 7/7/23 were negative. A copy is in the sharedrive.

Deficiency Narrative: The Drug test results were not available to review in one staff record.
Correction Narrative: RCCR Inspector reviewed the test results for the staff member missing the drug test. It was completed on 7/9/23 and the results were negative. A copy is in the sharedrive.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation does not have an administrator currently.
Correction Narrative: The owner and the new administrator sent an email stating that the operation has a new administrator.

Deficiency Narrative: The admission polices did not include the goals or services provided by the operation.
Correction Narrative: The owner sent a copy of the update policies to include the admission policies with the goals or services provided by the operation.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation does not have a written plan for their indoor or outdoor recreation for children.
Correction Narrative: Th owner sent a copy of the operation's outdoor recreation for the children.

Deficiency Narrative: The agency did not have policies to address the abuse and neglect standard.
Correction Narrative: The owner sent a copy of the operation's updated  abuse and neglect polices.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation's discipline policies did not address Guide caregivers and employees in the methods used for the discipline of children, integrate trauma informed care into the care, treatment, and management of each child, measures for positive responses to appropriate behavior, or the importance of nurturing behavior, stimulation, and promptly meeting the childÂ’s needs.
Correction Narrative: The owner sent updated policies to include the discipline polices. A copy of the complete policies has been uploaded to the sharedrive.

Deficiency Narrative: The organizational chart did not include all the positions for the operation. Also, the policies did not include all the written descriptions for all the positions listed on the chart.
Correction Narrative: The owner sent a copy of the updated organizational chart to address the current positions and written positions in the policies.

Deficiency Narrative: The operation did not address the admission services for emergency care.
Correction Narrative: The owner updated the 2960 for the operation. The operation will not be offering emergency services.

Deficiency Narrative: The emergency diagrams did not contain areas outside the operation for staff and children meet.
Correction Narrative: Th owner sent updated emergency diagrams to show the areas outside the operation for staff and children meet.
